segments.text: I think we have had a very pleasant conversation , haven't we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me think ... I want to know if the company can provide free accommodation for a new employee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really hope that your company could provide living places ; otherwise I have to rent a house to live .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe the company will build dormitory for the employees in the future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some companies will pay part of the phone bills for the employees . Will this company do so ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry we won't do so for a new employee . We only provide this benefit to employees who have made significant contributions to the company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . Will the company provide training ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we will , and the staff will have a chance to travel every year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
